qas.question: Who temporarily replaced Joe Royle as club captain after he resigned?
In what year was Howard Kendall appointed manager of the Everton FC for the third time?
Who took over for Howard Kendall after his third attempt at managing the Everton FC was unsuccessful?
How many successive finishes did Walter Smith manage for the Everton FC?
What rank did Everton place in the 1997 Premiership league?
In what season did Heysel stop managing Everton?
In what year did Howard Kendall first manage Everton?
In what year did Howard Kendall manage Everton for the second time?
During what season was Dave Watson made club captain?
Who managed the Bolton Wanderers during the 1995-96 season?

context: The cup triumph was also Everton's passport to the Cup Winners' Cup—their first European campaign in the post-Heysel era. Progress under Joe Royle continued in <b5_0><b8_0>1995–96<b8_0/><b5_0/> as they climbed to sixth place in the Premiership. A fifteenth-place finish the following season saw Royle resign towards the end of the campaign, to be temporarily replaced by club captain, <a0_0><b9_0>Dave Watson<b9_0/><a0_0/>. Howard Kendall was appointed Everton manager for the third time in <a1_0><b6_0><b7_0>1997<b7_0/><b6_0/><a1_0/>, but the appointment proved unsuccessful as Everton finished <a4_0>seventeenth<a4_0/> in the Premiership; only avoiding relegation due to their superior goal difference over Bolton Wanderers. Former Rangers manager <a2_0>Walter Smith<a2_0/> then took over from Kendall in the summer of 1998 but only managed <a3_0>three<a3_0/> successive finishes in the bottom half of the table.
